name: Captain Pepe Match 3
description:
There are nine levels, each one more difficult. If the same three terms in the series are connected, there is an increase in the result. There is a timer that reminds the player that he must finds and merge three same pictures as fast as possible. It is important to pay attention to the places where it is jelly, so the next level only goes when you clear all the jelly. There is, of course, a lightning-colored comb, which takes many fields, or the whole row.
Join our world of cartoon Captain Pepe and win match 3 puzzle games.
publishers: NS WEB DEVELOPMENT DOO NOVI SAD
